TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: Im always lookin for Aircraft Engineers Think you can have some friends put in some orders, We've ran into a dry run ATM and we need orders.

Sadly, no. But I have some aircraft I'm working on...well...not really aircraft.

It likes to go really high. Like really high.

EDIT: Also, I could pull this oldie out of the garage...just wipe off the dust.

Edited September 19, 2012 by Monkthespy

hi mate i need a large space station

space station specs:

must use this new mod (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20604-Plugin-Parts-0-16-Orbital-Rendezvous-and-Docking-Assistant)

must have three target nodes

must hold a large cruw

must have solar panels

and be at low kebin orbit 100.000m
Goodie, I use this mod but can it just be the core module, can you send up segments your self and build it the way you want it. Lemme get home from school and I will make an attempt at a core.

Got an interplanetary lander working!!!! Can land on Duna for sure! But it cannot return . Here are some pics http://imgur.com/a/MVEjA#0. 1 is a cool eclipse and the other is me landed on Duna. Just launch when 55 degrees behind Duna and launch at sunrise. Burn straight up DO NOT go into orbit around kerbin!!! Once you are on a collision course with Duna at 100km start slowing down at full throttle and open the parachutes. Sbowyer28 I can send you 2 mediafire links with a stock version and mechjeb version to put on the forum somewhere under Plooto or Mercury class and put it up for download for everyone. All I ask if you do that is just to give me credit for what I have done.

Edited September 20, 2012 by bigpapabearxx

Use Three regular fuel tanks, 1 high on the outside and use Small landing engines, Fuel line the middle to it and get rid of the decuplers, Should be lighter and work better, Im working on a launch vehicle for launching my Heavy Lander.
i think i have an interplanetair rocket and lander to but i am on the school computers now and the rocket is on my pc at home

I'd like a Duna-reaching space station/ISA Map telescope if you get a chance.

Lets give those engineers of yours a workout.

(also, Twilight is best poni)

For some reason I'm even having trouble getting a rocket to take of straight with the new update. They all keep leaning to the side, even with multiple ASAS modules and winglets and such. I did however build a working VTOL thanks to the new center of gravity/thrust visual cues. Made is a lot easier.
I Relaunched all our Old Missons, If anyone is interested in the Voyager Labs Persistance file Message Me, Here are two of the new missions.

Any Interplanetary Probe Orders, I have modified the Plooto II and it can get to any planet in the Kerbal Space Universe. Want Proof?

Duna

Eve

C'mon guys PLEASE Give me an order, I really need something next to impossible to do...

we could do a duna rover challge with the new NASA mars plane there making we could do it for 0.17! we better not close. WE ARE THE VOYAGER LAB KERBALS WE NEVER STOP CRASHING/WINING.we got the kerbal glow that will never end.....
heres a random ship kurtjmac youtube ksp vid 36 i think made me create a orbiter named after his! sorry no pictures
Im going to try that. Going to have to use robotics mod.

I Have a order If You Are Up To it! Make a stock ship that can make it all the planets and moons since you can't land on jool!

Try That!
I already have one made.
Working on one, The Plooto VI, The Plooto V is the 3 manned Mun rocket I promised but it is very hush hush and... Wait what, Plooto V PFFFFT Naaaaaaahhh....
